text: Va ʙar sari rohho manisined, to kasonero, ki ʙa Alloh imon ovardaand ʙo azoʙu sikancaho ʙitarsoned va az rohi Alloh ʙozdored va ʙa kacravi vodored. Va jod ored on goh, ki andak (kamquvvat) ʙuded, Alloh ʙar sumori sumo afzud va sumo doroi quvvat va aziz gasted. Va ʙingared, ki oqiʙati fasodkoron ci guna ʙudaast
